title: How many USB cameras can a Rasberry Pi handle simultaneously? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is an adapter board that enables you to have up to 16 cameras on a single R-Pi. Multi Camera Adapter Module for Raspberry Pi I have not tried it, so I can’t tell you whether this works well or not. If you Google “raspberry pi multiple cameras”, you will find lots of hits on what other people are doing, including multiple USB cameras etc.
